title: Selling : T205 Harry McIntyre Low Grade = Low Price
author: Misunderestimated

posts.post_title: Selling : T205 Harry McIntyre Low Grade = Low Price
posts.post_content:
Piedmont back (common) of this lesser Cubs pitcher who arrived in Chicago a couple years after their last Series win.
SOLD --$14 includes postage (insurance etc. is x-tra)
paypal accepted w/out surcharge.
First to email me at [url]bhodes@rcn.com[/url] accepting these terms get the card.
I'll take it for $14.  E-mail sent.  Thanks.
